latex:
Which of the following is equivalent to "If P is true, then Q is false."?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{``P is true or Q is false.''} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(B)}\ \text{``If Q is false then P is true.''} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(C)}\ \text{``If P is false then Q is true.''} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(D)}\ \text{``If Q is true then P is false.''} \qquad$\\
$ \textbf{(E)}\ \text{``If Q is true then P is true.''}$
